Featured-image: CH1506-black-sheer-sleeves-lace-appliqued-mother-of-the-brides-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: The sheer sleeves are flowing and match the movement of the floor length skirt. The top of the gown is overlayed with lace and has a sash at the waistline. The lace scalloped edges flow into the skirt while the back is a V-shape.
